ARABIC: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذْ فَزِعُوا۟ فَلَا فَوْتَ وَأُخِذُوا۟ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: If you could only see when they are terrified, and there is no way out, and they are seized from a nearby place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: If you could see when they are gripped by terror without any escape, and are seized from close at hand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: If you could only see when the unbelievers will go about in a state of terror. They will have no escape and will be seized from a place near at hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Would that you could see how the unbelievers will be terrified by death from which they cannot escape. They will be seized from a nearby place
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And if only you see, when they will be forced into a terror from which they will be unable to escape, and are seized from a place nearby. (Wherever they go, they are never far).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And if you could but see, when they will be terrified with no escape, and they will be seized from a near place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And could you see when they shall become terrified, but (then) there shall be no escape and they shall be seized upon from a near place
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Ah, if thou couldst see when they are terrified, and there is no escape, and they are seized from a place near at hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Couldst thou but see when they are terrified with no escape, and are seized from near at hand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: If you could only see when those who denied the truth are terrified, and there is no way out, and they are seized from a place nearby;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And couldst thou see the time when they shall be terrified! Then there shall be no escaping, and they shall be laid hold of from a place quite nigh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Were you to see them when they will be stricken with terror, without any escape, and are seized from a close quarter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: If thou couldst but see when they will quake with terror; but then there will be no escape (for them), and they will be seized from a position (quite) near.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And if you could but see, when they will be terrified with no escape (for them), and they will be seized from a near place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: If you could only see when they (the unbelievers) are seized with terror, and there is no escape. They shall be seized from a nearby place,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: If you could only see when they are terrified, and there is no escape, and they are seized from a nearby place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And if you could see when they are terrified but there is no escape, and they will be seized from a place nearby.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [34:51] If you could but see, O Muhammad (s), when they are stricken with terror, at the Resurrection, you would see a dreadful thing, and so there is no escape, for them, from Us, that is to say, they will not [be able to] elude Us, and they are seized from a close quarter, namely, [from] the graves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Couldst thou but see) Muhammad (when they are terrified) when the earth swallows them (with no escape) for anyone among them, (and are seized from near at hand) from beneath their feet the earth swallows them.
